example_utterances: I understand, but is there anything specific that's worrying you?
It's okay, don't worry about it. I know that things come up sometimes. Just make sure you're on time for this meeting.
Have you talked to anyone about this? Maybe we can work together to address any concerns you have.
Well, let's discuss your job performance and any specific areas you feel you could improve in. We can also set some goals to help you improve.
Of course, that's what I'm here for. Let's have a productive meeting today and work together to ensure your success in this role.
Oh, that's water under the bridge now. I appreciate you being here on time today.
Winning is always a great feeling. It's important to celebrate our victories.
Glad to hear that. Is there anything else on your mind that we should discuss?
Alright then, keep up the good work and don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything.
That sounds like a lot of fun. What did you guys do?
